objects.name: CopySourceData
objects.command:
mkdir -p /tmp/source && mkdir -p /tmp/dst && aws s3 cp #{myS3FilesList} files.json && cat files.json | jq -r '.files | map(.) | join("
")' | while read line ; do aws s3 cp $line /tmp/source/; done

objects.name: WwllnProcess
objects.command: docker pull developmentseed/cumulus-test:wwlln-processing > /dev/null && docker run -v /tmp/source:/ftp/private/hs3/internal/WWLLN/HS3storms -v /tmp/dst:/astage/ops/hs3wwlln --rm developmentseed/cumulus-test:wwlln-processing > /dev/null; curl -k #{mySplunkHECURL}?host=${HOSTNAME} --header 'Authorization: Splunk #{mySplunkHECToken}' --header 'X-Splunk-Request-Channel: $(uuidgen)' --data-binary '$(docker logs -t $(docker ps -q -n=1))'

objects.name: WwllnMetadata
objects.command: docker pull developmentseed/cumulus-test:wwlln-metadata > /dev/null && docker run -v /tmp/dst:/s3/wwlln --rm developmentseed/cumulus-test:wwlln-metadata > /dev/null; curl -k #{mySplunkHECURL}?host=${HOSTNAME} --header 'Authorization: Splunk #{mySplunkHECToken}' --header 'X-Splunk-Request-Channel: $(uuidgen)' --data-binary '$(docker logs -t $(docker ps -q -n=1))'
